item.description:
Feel like presenting? We have one, but there's always room for more! Speak up if you have suggestions/ideas!

The agenda is:

1) Intro's for new folks
2) General topic discussion
3) General hacking.
4) Very maybe a presentation on (your presentation here...yes you...seriously).

We'll take a sounding at 8pm and possibly break to reconvene at a local eating establishment. :)
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the loud guy with the beard. :P
item.name: The Metrowest Ruby Users Group May Meetup
